tool_description:
The NDS API allows developers to check for nudity in images in real-time. 

If you have a very high usage feel free to message me for a private plan.
name: Nudity Detection Service
title: Nudity Detection Service

api_list.name: Detect

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL Of the image to check for nudity ( Must be below 100KB in size)
